css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-885b4755-u{min-width:initial;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);flex-direction:row;-moz-column-gap:9%;column-gap:9%;}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-885b4755-u{-moz-column-gap:6.5%;column-gap:6.5%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-885b4755-u{justify-content:center;flex-direction:column;row-gap:30px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-885b4755-u{align-items:center;}}
